name: Schema Removal
author: Hesham

sections.description:
Genesis theme schema markup is great and super useful, however in some cases you will want to remove schema markups from your site, for example: when you want to implement schema by a plugin.

The Genesis Schema Removal plugin is what you need to do so.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire schema-removal folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. DO NOT change the name of the schema folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. That is all.
sections.faq:
The plugin isn’t working or have a bug?

Post detailed information about the issue in the support forum and we will work to fix it.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Fixed left overs markup while testing the plugin, now it is a clean code.

1.1

  • Fixed schema error when search midget is active.

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Remove Genesis theme Schema.org structured data markup from your WordPress site.
description:
Genesis theme schema markup is great and super useful, however in some cases you will want to remove schema markups from your site, for example: when you want to implement schema by a plugin.
